description: The versatile Renegade™ Afire Chino Pants offer the toughness and durability of hiking pants disguised as a refined pair of chinos. Soft yet extremely durable, Kuhl's exclusive softshell fabric is quick dry with abrasion and water-resistance. Superior stretch and our articulated patterning provide superior freedom of motion and the ideal fit. Maximum (UPF 50+) sun protection.
name: Renegade Afire Chino, 28" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: two front hand, one coin, two back and two stealth cell phone pocket
